Class GameBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameBoard

  • public class GameBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    GameBoard class contains methods which plays the game New Changes Made: Added conditional in checkForCompleteSet Last Changes Made: Added getIsWin(),Added decimalFormat to result screen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      GameBoard()
      Creates a GameBoard object initialized with land, random set of cards, and players
